message:
I'm having a trouble getting user's info beyond  the id and the full name 
I googled about the email and found out i need permission to be able to retrieve it the gender should be working fine but it's not working i also checked birthday and bio i can't retrieve them too any help would be appreciated
name: Photos from Ahmed Ibrahim's post

data.message: Why is that not a screenshot? :D

You need a permission for the birthday as well, but you can get the age_range if you like.
The gender might be a problem with your account, are you sure that you have told FB that you are a male!
You need to submit your app for review on Facebook so they can give you access to more than the basic info (name/email)

i solved the problem it was because  the new Facebook API v2.4 changed the way the response is being sent. Now you need to specify in the request url which fields you want the API to return so /me becomes /me?fields=email,name,etc...

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/31634408/facebook-graph-api-returns-only-name-and-id-for-some-websites
